about_the_game:
Welcome to the glamorous life of bounty hunting. As the Last Helion, your job is to take down the galaxy's most wanted fugitives and ultimately uncover the source of the impending collapse of galactic order. No pressure. This demo contains the first procedural level of the game, multiple missions and four factions battling for control.

Eliminate targets, extract the loot, and upgrade your kit. Rise through the Helion ranks, collect Helion cores and unlock new parts of your ship, weapons and gear. Check out the full game page for what comes after the demo.

Locate and Eliminate

Think of it as hide and seek but with higher stakes, fewer rules, and explosive augments. Missions are rapid and range in difficulty, but completing them will reward you with experience, resources and upgrades. Get in and get out with as much as you can, but make sure you make it to the extraction zone or risk losing that sweet, sweet loot.

Craft and Upgrade

Use loot, materials and the friendly black market vendor to upgrade your weapons and ammo. Experiment with projectiles, incendiaries and much more. A day in the life of a bounty hunter is never dull, you’ll be taking on a variety of enemies from run of the mill mutants to brutish bosses.

Rebuild your Base

Use Helion Cores from completed missions to rebuild your ship and unlock new functions and helpful crew. Your experience from missions also allows you to progress and upgrade your talents and skills.

Demo is 1-3 hrs depending on how many side missions you'd like to complete. It has three main bounty hunting missions and one procedural level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Last Helion is a bounty hunting extraction shooter with short, intense play sessions. Take down wanted fugitives across procedurally generated worlds. Battle warring factions and bosses to secure valuable loot. This demo contains the first procedural level and accompanying missions.
